metadata.title: Standing Committee reports on Biological Weapons Convention Bill in NA

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 15 (APP):The report of the Standing Committee on Foreign Affairs on Wednesday presented the Bill to give effect to the Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production and Stockpiling of Bacteriological (Biological) and Toxin Weapons and on their Destruction, 1972 (The Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention (implementation) Bill, 2024. The report was tabled in the House by Shaista Pervaiz.
